task_text: I'm joining Bellini soon. Where can I read about how time tracking works, and what are the main reasons we track time?

text_blocks: I can see you're accessing from the public website (is_public=true). This means you're not yet logged in as an employee.

input.message:
Welcome to Bellini Coatings! I'm glad to hear you'll be joining us soon.

However, information about our time tracking procedures is part of our internal documentation and is only available to employees with system access. Once you officially join and receive your employee credentials, you'll be able to access our internal wiki where time tracking policies and guidelines are documented.

In the meantime, if you have questions about onboarding or need information before your start date, I'd recommend reaching out to your HR contact or hiring manager directly. They can provide you with relevant information or point you to the right resources.

We look forward to having you on the team!
